extendedInfo.description: Mako Dozer is a funny game and let the players remember their childhoods that collect the interesting cachapons.Push the mako coins and exciting cachapons into your pocket by dropping them into the machine.Remember dun push them to the sides of machine and they will disappear.Collect the six different mako cachapons like mako sushi, mako donut, etc.Also we have five special skills to use so that you can get the coins and cachapons easier!!Game includes:- Nice cachapons- Most realistic physics- Upgrade your levels to let you easier to play- Amazing skills occur randomly- Interesting animation effect occurs when you get prizes.

reviews.title: Mako dozed
reviews.comment: My game won\'t open really would like to play this game can you please fix it
reviews.author: Kimberly Love

reviews.title: Okay - confusing, crashes frequently
reviews.comment: The graphic style of this game is cute, but the mechanics can be confusing because there is no language used to communicate what is happening, and worse yet, the spinner crashes the game without fail. Every single time it pops up and spins, the moment the spin finishes, the application closes. It makes it annoying to play and takes a lot of the fun out of it because you have to reopen it every few minutes.
reviews.author: Josephine Scarlet

reviews.title: Flaws
reviews.comment: Unable to find a way to close besides killing app, but needs fixed app is dead
